creditline: Gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky and the Ted and Dr. Roberta Mann Foundation Endowment Fund
description: woman with bobbed hair wearing black robe over Wonder Woman costume, walking on a tightrope; yellow bottom section with eyes (painted and collage); woman holds paintbrushes in one hand and a shirt on a hanger, with bare breasts and hand holding an abstracted bowl of red fruit on front; images in corners of Gauguin painting of woman with bowl of fruit; cloth borders with African printed motifs
medium: Acrylic on canvas with African fabric borders and photo transfer
signed: LRC in red and blue: E. Amos / c 1994 | printed in black at top and bottom red borders: TIGHTROPE
title: Tightrope
